title: Tunisia: Prestigious Beachfront Resort on the Mediterranean
description: Experience the North African side of the Mediterranean Sea and discover the beautiful stretches of beaches, opulent resorts, rich history and culture of Tunisia with a five or seven-night stay at Steigenberger Kantaoui Bay. Enjoy an automatic upgrade to a Seaview room, daily buffet breakfast and nightly buffet dinner.
offer_address: Port El Kantaoui, 4089 Port El Kantaoui, Tunisia
